channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024060521
item.description:
Report E-2024060521

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: SHELBY
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-XCF contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 2 pounds of "Sodium Hydrosulfite" from 2x 500g glass bottles, onto the dock floor. The box of the bottle was punctured by a forklift.

item.title: Report X-2024061017
item.description:
Report X-2024061017

  • State: IA

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED AT DOOR 212 UNLOAD WEARING PPE FOR A CORROSIVE LEAKING PACKAGE. USED THE DECISION TREE TO CONTAINERIZE AND CLEAN UP SPILLAGE. BROUGHT LEAKING PACKAGE TO HAZMAT CAGE AND FINISHED SOLIDIFYING AND NEUTRALIZING LIQUID.
